001// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.emptyfiltering;
004
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.HashMap;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Set;
010import java.util.regex.Pattern;
011
012import javax.persistence.PersistenceException;
013
014import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.entity.ProcessedDocument;
015import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.AbstractProcessingStep;
016import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.ProcessingException;
017import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.emptyfiltering.entity.NonEmptyTextDocument;
018import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.emptyfiltering.entity.NonEmptyTextWithTitleDocument;
019import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.emptyfiltering.xml.definition.IncludeRedditDeletedProcessingStepParameter;
020
021/**
022 * Skips copying to a processed entity a unprocessed entity that has all its
023 * texts attributes empty (or filled with non-alphabetical characters).
024 * <p>
025 * Example declaration for this step in a process definition file:
026 * </p>
027 * <pre>
028 * {@code <step action="EmptyFiltering">
029 *      <parameters>
030 *              <textDocumentWithTitleTableName>mention_filtered_submission</textDocumentWithTitleTableName>
031 *              <textDocumentTableName>mention_filtered_comment</textDocumentTableName>
032 *      </parameters>
033 * </step>}
034 * </pre>
035 *
036 * @author Alejandro González García
037 */
038final class EmptyFilteringProcessingStep extends AbstractProcessingStep {
039        private static final String INCLUDE_REDDIT_DELETED_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME = new IncludeRedditDeletedProcessingStepParameter().getName();
040
041        /**
042         * Instantiates a non empty filtering processing step.
043         */
044        EmptyFilteringProcessingStep() {
045                super(
046                        // Additional mandatory and optional parameters, with their validation function
047                        Map.of(
048                                INCLUDE_REDDIT_DELETED_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME, (final String value) -> value != null
049                        ),
050                        // Additional mandatory parameters
051                        Set.of()
052                );
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        protected void run() throws ProcessingException {
057                final List<Class<? extends ProcessedDocument>> processedDocumentTypes = List.of(
058                        NonEmptyTextWithTitleDocument.class, NonEmptyTextDocument.class
059                );
060                final Pattern emptyRegex;
061
062                if (
063                        IncludeRedditDeletedProcessingStepParameter.convertValueToBoolean(
064                                getParameters().getOrDefault(INCLUDE_REDDIT_DELETED_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME, "true")
065                        )
066                ) {
067                        emptyRegex = Pattern.compile(
068                                "^[\\[(][\\p{Space}]*(?:removed|deleted|remove|delete)[\\p{Space}]*[\\])]$|^[^\\p{Lower}]*$",
069                                Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE | Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS
070                        );
071                } else {
072                        emptyRegex = Pattern.compile(
073                                "^[^\\p{Lower}]*$",
074                                Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE | Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS
075                        );
076                }
077
078                try {
079                        // Delete previous results
080                        for (final Class<? extends ProcessedDocument> processedDocumentType : processedDocumentTypes) {
081                                deleteAllProcessedDocumentsOfType(processedDocumentType);
082                        }
083
084                        for (int i = 0; i < processedDocumentTypes.size(); ++i) {
085                                final String[] unprocessedAttributeNames = unprocessedDocumentsAttributes.get(i);
086                                final Class<? extends ProcessedDocument> processedDocumentType = processedDocumentTypes.get(i);
087
088                                forEachDocumentInNativeQuery(
089                                        unprocessedDocumentsQuerySuppliers.get(i),
090                                        String.format("Filtering empty %s", unprocessedDocumentTypesNames.get(i)),
091                                        numberOfUnprocessedEntitiesProviders.get(i).get(),
092                                        (final List<String[]> batchAttributes) -> {
093                                                final Map<String, String> documentAttributesMap = new HashMap<>(
094                                                        (int) Math.ceil(unprocessedAttributeNames.length / 0.75)
095                                                );
096
097                                                for (final String[] documentAttributes : batchAttributes) {
098                                                        boolean allAreEmpty = true;
099                                                        for (int j = 0; j < unprocessedAttributeNames.length && allAreEmpty; ++j) {
100                                                                allAreEmpty = emptyRegex.matcher(documentAttributes[j + 1]).matches();
101                                                        }
102
103                                                        if (!allAreEmpty) {
104                                                                // Pass through the document attributes
105                                                                for (int j = 0; j < unprocessedAttributeNames.length; ++j) {
106                                                                        documentAttributesMap.put(unprocessedAttributeNames[j], documentAttributes[j + 1]);
107                                                                }
108
109                                                                saveProcessedDocument(
110                                                                        processedDocumentType, Integer.parseInt(documentAttributes[0]),
111                                                                        Collections.unmodifiableMap(documentAttributesMap)
112                                                                );
113                                                        }
114                                                }
115                                        },
116                                        null
117                                );
118                        }
119                } catch (final IllegalArgumentException | PersistenceException exc) {
120                        throw new ProcessingException(DATA_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, exc);
121                }
122        }
123}
